timeline.message:
[core] Add Node#findDescendantsOfType with crossFindBoundaries that
returns a list like all other find-methods

timeline.bodyText:
On 7.0.x, node streams use these methods internally to iterate. This means, iteration here cannnot use node streams. #2220 anyway makes the class internal and documents this. I'll fix this when merging on 7.0.
Oh I didn't see this was on AbstractNode. Everything is moved to TraversalUtils on 7.0.x.
